name: Chink In the Armour
description:
Welcome to your very own blacksmith's shop!
  • Ensure the survival of your shop and earn as much gold as you can.
  • Be sure to be quick with dealing with customers, as unhappy customers will leave complaints!
  • Mine for copper and iron ore and smelt those into ingots using your magical smelting machine.
  • Use your handy hammer to craft heavy or light armour to fulfil any customer orders.

Game created solo for the Game Off 2022 game jam with a theme of 'cliché' (chink in the armour).

All assets and models except for the character models were created by me in Blender. The character models used for customers are from Polytope Studios (Lowpoly Medieval Peasants - Free pack | Characters | Unity Asset Store).
